enb_long_title: Twentieth Session of the Subsidiary Bodies to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Chair Stoycheva reported on a meeting of the SBSTA and SBI Chairs and the Chairs of the Expert Group on Technology Transfer, Consultative Group of Experts on non-Annex I national communications, and LDC Expert Group (LEG) in response to decision 10/CP.8 (development and transfer of technologies) to facilitate collaboration among the expert groups established under the UNFCCC.
She then invited Parties to consider draft conclusions on a number of agenda items.
